name: Ink-o-Saur
description:
Face waves of alien dinosaur zombies with your friends

Attack enemies of your color to deal more damage.

When a friend returns to be an egg, hit it to make him come back!

Please leave any kind of comment.

Commands:

Left Joystick - Move

A - Run

X - Left Attack

B - Right Attack

Credits:

Federico Ciardi - Game Designer, Game Programmer

Samuele Zolfanelli - Game Programmer, Graphics Artist

Thanks to @ScissorMarks for the Dino sprites: https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters
